components.name: ImportExportPageComponent

Import / Export

The goal of this page is to support importing / exporting story data.

components.name: LandingPageComponent
components.templateData:
Source Code 
  If you want to write a {{scriptLength}} page script,
  you write a page in {{1 / pagesPerSprint}} "sprints",
  each layer of the script splits on average into {{splitFactor}} pieces,
  you give up on {{giveUpRate()}}% of stories after you get to half depth, it will take you
  {{calculateSessionsRequired() | number}} sessions ({{calculateSessionsRequired() / sessionsPerDay | number}} days)
  to complete your script, given {{sessionsPerDay / 4}} hrs of writing per day
  ({{sessionsPerDay}} 15-minute sessions).

  In a flat writing approach, it would take {{calculateFlatAlternativeSessions()}} sessions
  ({{(calculateFlatAlternativeSessions() - calculateSessionsRequired()) / sessionsPerDay}} days longer).

Workspace: {{workspaceName}}

Structure Templates Brainstorm Templates Tags Beats

No current workspace!

Go to the data page to load from file.
